mapper.insert: insert into job_list( job_CompanyName, job_IsPartTime, job_Title, job_Desc, job_Degree, job_Sex, job_WorkAddress, job_Salary, job_EmpCount, job_Contact, job_PublishtTime, job_ExpireTime, job_Remarks, job_Status )values( #{jobCompanyName}, #{jobIsPartTime}, #{jobTitle}, #{jobDesc}, #{jobDegree}, #{jobSex}, #{jobWorkAddress}, #{jobSalary}, #{jobEmpCount}, #{jobContact}, #{jobPublishtTime}, #{jobExpireTime}, #{jobRemarks}, #{jobStatus} )
